tool.name: tool_3

param.name: WEIGHT
param.dialogReference:
Minimum Weight

Floating point

Maximum: 0.000000

Default: 0.000000

restricts extrapolation by assigning minimal allowed weight for a vertex (normally \"-1\" or so; lower values correspond to lower reliability; \"0\" means no extrapolation)

tool.summary: Natural Neighbour method for grid interpolation from irregular distributed points. This tool makes use of the 'nn - Natural Neighbours interpolation library' created and maintained by Pavel Sakov, CSIRO Marine Research.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Conrad, O., Bechtel, B., Bock, M., Dietrich, H., Fischer, E., Gerlitz, L., Wehberg, J., Wichmann, V., and Boehner, J. (2015): System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses (SAGA) v. 2.1.4, Geosci. Model Dev., 8, 1991-2007, doi:10.5194/gmd-8-1991-2015. [SAGA - System for Automated Geoscientific Analyses - saga-gis.org]
